title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing paths with five counterparts from other dimensions.

title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
description: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
description: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world’s greatest supervillain.

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
description: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll, and sets out on an epic journey to restore his nine lives.

title: Turning Red
description: A thirteen-year-old girl is torn between staying her mother's dutiful daughter and the chaos of adolescence.
